website_summaries.verdict: Good price for a high-quality outdoor volleyball with hand-sewn construction.
pros: Matches the official game ball of the AVP pro beach volleyball league
Microfiber composite leather cover construction will stand up to plenty of practice and game time while resisting dirt and moisture
Ball's exterior includes an 18-panel construction for a long lifespan
cons: Price is higher than some other options

customer_reviews.title: Play a couple times a week and the ball has lasted a year now and is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: Yup it's a volleyball. If you take a little air out when you are not using them they last a long time. Play a couple times a week and the ball has lasted a year now and is still in great shape... ROUND and the cover is still good
customer_reviews.author: UVM in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Love this volleyball.  Soft, great grip.  Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great volleyball. I'm old and don't play as often as I'd like to and don't get to play with good players as often as I wish. But it has been a great ball for 2 years. I do take very good care of it. It's also came way down in price. I do plan to buy it again. It's great for outdoor play. Soft enough... good grip... I love it. I used to spend more on good volleyballs but this one is very good and not that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: TiMonte

customer_reviews.title: Fine Ball! I have a second one on the way!
customer_reviews.text: I have thoroughly enjoyed playing beach volleyball with the Wilson ball, I have used the Spalding ball for a few years now and wasn’t sure if I would like the Wilson ball as much, it has become the favorite ball to play with, but it’s also the newer of the two. The Mikasa ball didn’t hold up long enough to be tested properly, it found a stray piece of wire on the court, which ruined the ball. But everyone still preferred the Wilson over the Spalding and the Mikasa.
customer_reviews.author: Carl L. Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Glossy, not for all VB players, not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely durable. This one has a gloss which most of the volleyball players I play with do not like and complain to me about it. Think of this if you buy it. It doesn’t bother me, but this just depends on the user’s preference. This one is lite so you have to adjust your serve and spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Lam-A

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball for Outdoor Play
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this volleyball to replace a previous Wilson Official AVP volleyball that had seen better days. The previous volleyball was about 3 years old and had seen a lot of play so I think that these speak to the durability of the construction. The only issues with the previous ball was some nicks and cuts on the ball from being used on non-grass and sand surfaces, so can't knock the ball there. Overall a great ball and the official ball of the AVP so you can't go wrong there, and to have the ball that the pro's play with at an affordable price, I don't know why you would look at an alternative ball.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chaput

customer_reviews.title: Ball is great. Holds air well
customer_reviews.text: Ball is great. Holds air well. Pumped it up once and it has not lost any air in over a month. Ball can be affected by the wind. I read similar reviews from other people and I now see where they are coming from. Overall very happy with my purchase. I bought the ball along with the Park & Sun Sports Spectrum Classic: Portable Professional Outdoor Volleyball Net System. A match made in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: The Go-To Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball. Great feel, good speed, good quality. If you are playing outdoor volleyball, this is the ball that I would recommend. It is a bit pricey and has been replaced as the official beach volleyball, but I believe this ball is better than the rest. Worth the price if you are playing any sort of competitive outdoor volleyball. Great for sand and for grass.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is not just a beach volleyball, it is THE beach volleyball.
customer_reviews.text: This is not just a beach volleyball, it is THE beach volleyball. You can't call yourself a serious beach player if you don't own several of these. Moreover, this is the best ball I've played with, and this includes previous "official" balls of various organizations. Takes some getting used to at first if you're used to the firmer and less bouncy balls of yore, but once you get a hang of it you won't go back. The control and predictability you can get with this ball is simply far beyond any other I've tried. One more thing: don't buy the "replica" of this ball. You might save a few bucks, but it would simply not handle nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. F.

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time. Whenever we play and ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. Whenever we play and someone else has a ball, we let them choose which they want to play with and my ball gets picked 95% of the time, if not more.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: My favorite beach volleyball.
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this ball. Our team has been playing this one for 5 years. If playing every day with sweaty players, expect it to wear out fast. We go through about 1 per 12-24 months. It has a soft feel even when (accidentally) overinflated.
customer_reviews.author: fields

customer_reviews.title: Stood up to the test
customer_reviews.text: I played beach volleyball every Saturday for about four years with a large group of people in San Diego. Definitely more than three games in the organization we used. This ball lasted through that as well as the next two years of on and off again pick up games throughout the week. I left it with a friend when I left. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Regulation Ball. Perfect for the Volleyball Player in your family!
customer_reviews.text: The real thing. I can't tell the difference, but after buying (and returning) a number of these for our volleyball playing daughter that look pretty much identical (but are imitations), we got this and she's thrilled. Just like the pros use (or weekend warriors, in her case).
customer_reviews.author: Talisman

customer_reviews.title: The only ball for outdoor!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best outdoor ball in my opinion. Just about everyone at the location I play, twice a week, has this ball and we all love it. Nobody uses the other brands' balls that are laying around that the bar bought. I bought the replica in the past, used it for 2 weeks, and its terribly. Not even close to this, the real thing. Pony up the $50 for this ball, its worth it! The material is very comfortable for setting and the compression feels great, with some leway for air pressure, for passing and hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Or liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why people buy cheap volleyballs. If one is on the court all the time, what beguiles me is people who don't spend 30% more on a volleyball. It's wonderful. Unfortunately, I got my stolen by a gang of kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Gym volleyballs are harder than rocks - this is better
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was strange that the gym's volleyballs were like bumping, hitting and spiking a bowling ball, and I was right - this one is much softer and has "spring" to it, versus the one the gym left outside for days and days in the weather. Glad to have my own for future games. I'm just getting into volleyball and happier already since my hands aren't purple from hitting the rock-hard one at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: This ball plays really well and seems to be pretty durable. 5 stars so far
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews for this item state that the ball is delivered uninflated. My ball was delivered inflated at the proper PSI. I go through a lot of outdoor volleyballs (that's the nature of outdoor balls). This ball plays really well and seems to be pretty durable. 5 stars so far, if anything happens to change my mind about this product, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent ball. I bought it because I wanted a ball to play with that was similar to the ones used in all the leagues I've been in and this one is the same. Seems to be made out of an easier to grip material than other vballs I've used in the past. This is a very good ball and the price was unbeatable. In local sporting goods stores the same ball can be upwards of 50.00 USD.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Wilson official AVP volleyball
customer_reviews.text: I love this volleyball. I have this ball and the Spalding King of the Beach volleyball. Both are great.. The Spalding volleyball tends to absorb water if it rolls into a river or lake and could get very heavy until it dries out. This ball doesn't absorb as much, but tends to get slippery when trying to set from sweat or precipitation.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Always been my favorite
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought the AVP brand I bought the replica because I was new and I just like the way the ball looked. Having said that I got a recommendation to get the official game ball such as this one and after playing with it right away I could feel the difference. The ball feels amazing with how soft and flexible it is after being hit. It feels great to play with and I'm really glad I invested in this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality volleyball, though the first one we got ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality volleyball, though the first one we got only lasted a couple weeks and then would no longer inflate. Second one has lasted about 6 months now and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing official real leather AVP beach ball at a GREAT price. This is not the latest year's graphics, but the quality is the same. These used to go for $50 all day long. I'm so happy I found this! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: maddog24

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after a couple of months use
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my second AVP ball that is not holding air after a few months use. The warranty period for these balls considering how expensive they are is way too short, you basically have one month to return them and I have had this ball for about 5 months. At these prices they should at least last for a year.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fridriksson

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this ball for about a month now and we like it. The cheaper $10-15 balls seam's kept breaking causing bulges in the ball. There is no sign of this occuring yet. It is also easier to control the ball when bouncing off your arms. It itsn't as bouncey as cheaper balls making it easier to return spikes and serves.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best outdoor volleyballs we’ve tried. It has a good hand feel compared to others. We wore 2 out & are back for a third!
customer_reviews.author: janejolene

customer_reviews.title: great ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball. I'd even say great. However with the AVP now being defunct I'd get the Wilson King of the Beach ball. The Wilson ball seems to be a bit heavier which makes it a little more stable in the wind. People love playing with my ball, but when there is a Wilson ball around and it is windy (when is it not windy in beach volleyball?) people prefer the Wilson because it is a bit heavier. Also make sure if you do get this you're getting the Official one, the other one is pretty shoddy. Same with the Wilson ball make sure you're getting the higher end one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality volleyball, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball, I would highly recommend for anyone that wants to play beach or indoor. I would not recommend using this in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor J.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor Vball
customer_reviews.text: most Vballs fall apart with real outdoor uses. These last a long time and have a great feel to it. A real game ball, not for just some back yard peppering. In sand, you might want the all leather, but these hold up well...
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Balls to the wall
customer_reviews.text: Official ball, which means I am now an official baller. This ball is durable and is great after playing with it for a few weeks and breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Real is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Get the real ball! Going on 5 seasons of using 2 of these and they are still in remarkable shape. Holds air, great feel, low "springiness?", and incredibly sturdy. I do recommend a cheaper replica ball to keep in your bag for rainy times on the court though. If these balls get wet/soaked, they are done. Turns into a heavy brick in a week. Better to lose $15 once a season than $60 after every shower.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Andoe

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this volleyball. It doesn't sting my hands and arms like some of the other do. It came ready to play, and I used it the first day I got it. We all love it! I saw the same ball in a sporting goods store for twice the price. The only difference was a picture and 2 signatures by Olympic players. I would recommend this volleyball for anyone who loves volleyball like I do!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comes in the retail packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering this volleyball after reading some of the reviews about the packaging. My volleyball came fully inflated in the cardboard packaging just like it would be in the store. I am very happy with this purchase. It seems like a great volleyball. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matskee

customer_reviews.title: great professional volleyball
customer_reviews.text: It is an exceptionally good quality volleyball, and it has lasted much longer than volleyballs previously purchased. It is a softer hit than usual, which is easier on the hands and wrists for an extended play. I am very happy with the quality and durability of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Troan

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: I play sand volleyball 3-5 times a week and needed a good volleyball. This is perfect and everyone loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: You can never have too many!
customer_reviews.text: My 5th one added to my beach volleyball collection. They last a long time, and you can never have too many beach volleyballs.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved the design on the ball
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that plays volleyball uses this ball. I gave it as a gift along with some permanent markers. The birthday guy allowed his girlfriend decorate the ball so no one could say it was theirs. Everyone loved the design on the ball!
customer_reviews.author: T.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice sand volleyball and at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I very nice sand volleyball. We bought two. They are cheaper than King of the Beach and they are nice balls. Make sure you buy the correct model.
customer_reviews.author: John Crady

customer_reviews.title: Amaze ball!
customer_reviews.text: This ball was so amazing. The material was soft and it came perfectly inflated which was great so it was ready to use right away. It didn't sting my arms when playing and everyone thought it was great. Super pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic outdoor ball. We keep a bag full of balls for outdoor training, and the Wilson gold consistently plays well and has proven to be very durable, holding up to the rigors of a hard summers use quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Photog

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This ball came highly recommended by several people who coach and play VB regularly. They were very specific about making sure I bought this ball and not the almost "look alike" that Wilson also makes. Can't remember the exact name but apparantly it's no where near as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. Delivered with glue residue on ball
customer_reviews.text: We use this ball to play volleyball at the company I work for. I like the feel / texture of this ball so purchased one for myself to practice. The only negative was that the ball was delivered with what appeared to be adhesive residue in a few spots (size of a quarter and size of a dime). I thought the adhesive would rub off, but it has not. My advice: get the ball and inspect it upon receipt. Return if it has adhesive spots because they may not come off.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Dantzer

customer_reviews.title: A+ shipped on time. Came as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two balls and both came as expected. Shipped on time. Avid vball tournament player, no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Pool

customer_reviews.title: No Signature, I was sold a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: the volleyball is usauble, but no signature found, so its a knockoff!! The real one is softer, this is a bit tougher? Buy the real beach volleyball, not the knockoff! I thought the price suggested the real thing not the cheaper knockoff!!
customer_reviews.author: Eusebio Pancho Viajar

customer_reviews.title: The balls are over sized. I don’t know if ...
customer_reviews.text: The balls are over sized. I don’t know if it’s because they’ve been sitting around pumped to long before I bought them but there big. I’ve been playing on the AVP for 15 years now. These balls don’t feel right.
customer_reviews.author: everett m.

customer_reviews.title: Still looks and plays great.
customer_reviews.text: Quality made ball that holds up over time. I've had my ball for 3 months nows, playing 2 to 3 times a week. Still looks and plays great.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: A great ball. Not too tough
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. A great ball. Not too tough, not too soft. I use it to practice and play games. Everyone loves it. My little brother even uses it to practice dunking, ha.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Agun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor ball. Everyone's (on our sand volleyball court) favorite. Lasts for years and gets a lot of play.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Listener

customer_reviews.title: Came fully inflated and perfect
customer_reviews.text: The Wilson AVP volleyball just arrived via Prime delivery. In contrast to the numerous complaints about the volleyballs arriving deflated, this volleyball arrived in a large box, and fully-inflated to playing pressure. Another surprise was that the volleyball was perfectly spherical. In the old days, I used to have to hand-spin 60+ balls to find one to buy. None were ever this good.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Baker, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Feel and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and love playing volleyball at the beach with this durable, well made volleyball!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE ELLIOTT

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball, Soft yet good bounce.
customer_reviews.text: My Kids love this ball, best one they have and use! Softer than most and whether you spend thousands on a court or just having fun in the back yard, this ball feels and works great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do use a cheap rubber outdoor volleyball...
customer_reviews.text: Instead get one of these. This is a great outdoor volleyball. It has a feel very similar to an indoor ball but the durability needed for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baylor

customer_reviews.title: good quality but I'd recommend getting the king of beach ball instead
customer_reviews.text: good quality ball. My friend has the king of the beach ball and I like that one better as his panels are better feeling for sand ball. I'd recommend getting the king of the beach ball instead of this one.
customer_reviews.author: RockstarBruski

customer_reviews.title: Great ball and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I've played with the Spalding ball for years. The Wilson is a great ball. Maintains pressure and ages well. Contrary to earlier complaints, my ball arrived inflated, so no issues with roundness.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice softer touch.... i am a newbie so not really very accurate in my presentation.
customer_reviews.author: MatteoMak

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this ball. Brought it with us for a camping trip and it was the hit of the campground!
customer_reviews.author: DBSF

customer_reviews.title: The stretches cane out while playing in a month!
customer_reviews.text: The worst part is one out of two balls got thenmanufacturing defect. The stretches came out , while playing. Which mean I can give 50% positive feedback for this Wilson official AVP ball!
customer_reviews.author: JESTIN P.

customer_reviews.title: Not inflated all the way
customer_reviews.text: The ball did not come at full inflation. Disappointing for a competition ball.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: I receive this ball within 24 hours after I place the order, and service of amazon shipping is incredible. This ball is very good looking and good to play. Trust, you won't be regret of buying this ball for play sporting. Have fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex*

customer_reviews.title: Best ever ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. No other ball like these This was the third time I bought the same ball. I've been an amateur player for 25 years. I've played Mikasas, Spaldings, Wilsons, Adidas, and Nike balls all over the time. No one compares to thie, not even the Micasa Olympic tri-color ball. So far we play mostly outdoor. This is the easiest ball to defend and set. You can recieve a very hard spike, and you can hardly feel the pain in your arms. I hope they keep selling these the next years.
customer_reviews.author: GUILLERMO FILIPICH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and it arrived in great condition and is just what she was looking for, great feel and quality and will be put to good use!
customer_reviews.author: WiseMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter thinks she's tough with this professional quality ball.
customer_reviews.author: midnight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect volleyball for our sand volleyball Sundays
customer_reviews.text: Perfect volleyball for our sand volleyball Sundays. This is our fourth one in 10 years. They hold up really well until someone hits them into the giant sticker bush.
customer_reviews.author: Denise T

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's a volley ball
customer_reviews.text: Got this sweet deal on this guy during prime day. It's a volleyball and it's great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not great
customer_reviews.text: I do like Wilson AVP volleyball but the one that i have received was not of great quality. Just after a month the stitches were seen(snapshot attached). Good part is still we are playing with this volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great outdoor volleyballs. Get this real one, not the "replica" one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Desired
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the reviews stating that the ball might arrive deflated and possibly warped. This was NOT the case for my package. My ball arrived fully inflated with 3.25 lbs of pressure. The ball plays perfectly and my volleyball league buddies are impressed with my saving $25 by not purchasing from Big 5 Sporting Goods, our local specialty store. This is the ONLY beach ball we play with in our league. There is not a better volleyball for high visibility and consistent play. Just don't get the ball wet-- the ball with disintegrate at the seams!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jazzman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good beach ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good ball at a pretty reasonable price. Main complaint is that it does not hold air as well as my indoor Molten balls. This guys needs to be topped up every week, whereas the Moltens sometimes go for months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grigoriev

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is having fun practicing with her new volleyball. It is a good weight-heavier than a volleylite which for my daughter is too lite. She sends her attacks and serves too far. She is not having that problem with this ball.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vrbensky

customer_reviews.title: it's a great ball.
customer_reviews.text: Came inflated in a regular retail box. We keep it at the lower end of the inflation range otherwise it feels hard for an outdoor ball. At that pressure, it's a great ball.
customer_reviews.author: MCC PE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Buck up and buy this ball and not the cheap replica's.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: this is what all the "pros" were using and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: When we went to the beach, this is what all the "pros" were using and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: 5150KOR

customer_reviews.title: I like this version better
customer_reviews.text: Previously I accidentally bought the replica version. I like this version better.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, easy on the arms and face when necessary. Bump. Set. Spike.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Great ball! Came fully inflated
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! Came fully inflated, after several weeks of use, in warm and cold weather, has held up nicely. This is the official ball and not a replica.
customer_reviews.author: SmilinSarahK

customer_reviews.title: Deflated and no packaging :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this volleyball (and some sand socks) for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day. Many of the reviews suggested that the ball was being shipped deflated and not in packaging, whereas others were saying they didn't have that issue. The ball was indeed shipped to me deflated and with no Wilson packaging on it, so I had to go out of my way to get it inflated to the appropriate weight before I could give it as a gift. Rather inconvenient, but the only real complaint. Just hoping it stands up to the sand season!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Best Volleyball for Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I've played with this ball for years and its still the best outdoor volleyball around. Consistent flight and control, and it lasts a long time if you take care of it (even when playing a few times a week)!
customer_reviews.author: overbybr

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! It does exactly what it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It does exactly what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: JoeF

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ball. A bit slippery for my taste but that's just me. This is THE ball to have for outdoors. Cheapest on amazon than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: sp911

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good for beach VB, this is the official ball
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Waited for a deal and it was worth it, ...
customer_reviews.text: Waited for a deal and it was worth it, feels great-no need to break in-LOVE my new OFFICIAL BEACH VOLLEYBALL!
customer_reviews.author: PugaBear

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this Staple ball
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ball! Easier on the shoulder than the KOB or the FIVB and is more widespread. Still, I like the other two just as much. Just a little different.
customer_reviews.author: BED

customer_reviews.title: working great!
customer_reviews.text: I keep pounding away and Wilson always serves up an Ace ;) Most popular ball in my small circle of buddies -- we each have at least one! Thanks Wilson...
customer_reviews.author: David Jackemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this volleyball! It is not a replica, just last year's model.
customer_reviews.author: A-Train

customer_reviews.title: great ball, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball. Although everyone in my area has changed to the spalding black and white ball, I still find this ball to be a fantastic volleyball for the novice to advanced player
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: This is a great beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach volleyball, highly recommend it. Some balls feel cheap or off weight, but this one is really high quality.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball review
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grandson...10th grade high school varsity player. He was thrilled with it for his summer time backyard volleyball practice. Said it is great quality. Also, it arrived one day earlier than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie E. Lingenberg

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hours of FUN
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! Has provided many hours of fun! Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DandMLane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wilson's best beach volleyball! Has a good feel and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Newton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a volleyball that works well both on grass and sand. This is that ball. I would recommend spending a couple more dollars and get the pure leather ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... style ball in my volleyball league and I am happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: The most popular style ball in my volleyball league and I am happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan03

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a Wilson AVP ball...grab one up and play.
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: It's the best
customer_reviews.text: The best. If you have this ball, everyone will want to use it if they brought the cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: Troy in Austin

customer_reviews.title: The Only Ball to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my best friend who is an avid volleyball player. If you can afford to buy the official balls over the replica ones, definitely do it. Their feel and playability is second to none. Stock up when you can get cheap prices and serve till your heart's content... and sandy.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as represented, buy it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ball as I remember them. Just wish I had the body I once had to go along with this new ball.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball.
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these when I lived in Huntington Beach and loved it. Leant it out and never got it back. Bought another one and am thrilled! I looked at Sports Authority first but then found the SAME ball on Amazon for 1/2 the price. Thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Good for grass doubles
customer_reviews.text: We chose this ball as it is one of the approved balls of Volleynation grass doubles in Northern CA. Ball has a good weight and won't float away in a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly warped but doesn't seem to affect the play. Holds air pretty well. Seems durable. Not as slipper as some balls
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, can tell the difference between other brands, softer hit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marques

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every weekend
customer_reviews.text: Never played any thing other than these. Perfect for every weekend. They seems to lighten up after extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: 11leven

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the quality and happy with the price point
customer_reviews.text: Volleyballs arrived full of air so there was not any issues with the shape as stated in other reviews. Happy with the quality and happy with the price point. Most of all, happy to have new volleyballs out on the court!
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! All of my friends and all of the leagues I've played in use this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mel D

product_meta.title: Wilson Official AVP Outdoor Volleyball
product_meta.description:
Premium cover material provides softer feel. Structural layer provides extended durability and round shape retention. Hand sewn construction is stitched by hand for expert craftsmanship. WHAT DOES IT TAKE TO BE THE OFFICIAL BALL OF THE AVP?
It takes revolutionary technology and ground-breaking performance. This volleyball features a hand sewn, durable microfiber construction that’s a benchmark of outdoor players around the world. That’s why Kerri Walsh-Jennings chooses Wilson volleyballs to dominate every game. When true champions rule the sand, they do it with the Official Ball of the AVP. Looking to play with the best volleyball on the beach or grass that the pros play with? The Wilson AVP Game Ball has set the standard to which all others aspire to achieve on the sand. Utilizing hand-sewn construction technologies, the AVP Game Ball is constructed with the finest materials and exquisite craftsmanship to provide the highest level of superior beach performance.


FEATURES
 * Premium microfiber composite leather cover provides a softer feel
 * Structural layer extends the durability of the ball and helps the ball retain its round shape
 * Hand sewn construction for expert craftsmanship
 * Greater resistance to dirt and less moisture absorbency than leather
 * 18-panels
 * Made to the highest specifications and standards of the AVP

ABOUT WILSON
It’s the sweat and the hard work you give every day that makes you a champion. At Wilson we put in that same level of work to develop innovations for players everywhere. That’s why 3-time gold medalist Kerri Walsh-Jennings trusts Wilson to deliver the championship performance. But we don’t stop there. We’re always focused on working with the best teams and athletes to continually develop the top indoor and outdoor volleyball products. At Wilson, being a champion isn’t just a title, it’s our life.




AMAZON.COM
Designed for competitive players, the Wilson AVP Official Game Ball is a top-of-the-line volleyball that is played on the AVP Tour. It features a premium microfiber composite leather cover that resists dirt and moisture and a butyl rubber bladder for superior rebound and air retention. Other features include a hand-sewn 18-panel construction, yellow logo and panels for improved visibility and an official size and weight.

 About Wilson
At the heart of sports history for almost a century, Wilson has been influential and intimately involved in shaping the games of tennis, golf, baseball, and American football. As the originator of breakthrough technologies, Wilson has produced legendary classics and earned world-wide legitimacy in each sport it participates in. The world's leading manufacturer of ball sports equipment, Wilson's core sports include tennis, baseball, American football, golf, basketball, softball, badminton, and squash. A division of Helsinki-based Amer Sports, Wilson is headquartered in Chicago.
